*Notes:* 
The poem is intended to be read first as in standard English, left to right, top to bottom, then to be read again as a geologist would read strata, from bottom to top, and *right to left*. Feel your eyes as you read upward. The poem is formatted to resemble a rock formation in [Monument Valley](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monument_Valley) and [The Valley of the Gods](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Valley_of_the_Gods).
